source.dde4b0f4:
### <center>DESCRIPTION

<center>This datasets is related to red variants of the Portuguese "Vinho Verde" wine.
<center>The dataset describes the amount of various chemicals present in wine and their effect on it's quality. 
 <center>The datasets can be viewed as classification or regression tasks. 
 <center>The classes are ordered and not balanced (e.g. there are much more normal wines than excellent or poor ones).

### <center> TASK
<center>To predict the quality of wine using the given data.

### <center> COMPLEXITY
<center>The dataset has fewer samples, & is highly imbalanced.
